1587410.name: Greedy Miners
1587410.description:
A cave full resources, a single exit, two companies... 
What could go wrong ?

In this team based online multiplayer game, trust is a luxury. Explore, upgrade your equipment, and gather resources as you race against your secret opponents. Don’t show mercy — they won’t.

Features :

One goal, two hidden teams:

Every player secretly works for one of two competing companies. Everyone wants gold. Everyone wants out. But only your team’s haul counts toward victory. Cooperate — or quietly get in the others' way.

Explore and upgrade:

Mine resources to improve your gear, craft tools, and deploy oxygen relays to reach deeper into the cave. Search for crates, discover hidden paths, and watch your back.

Gadgets over guns:

Collapse tunnels, reveal loyalties, open new paths — or throw in some chaos. There’s no combat, but tools can make or break a run.

Learn who to trust (before it's too late):

Use gadgets to discover other's company. Make temporary allies... Just don't let them fool you.

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
